genre_description: A heart-warming near-future domestic drama focused on a family's financial struggles, community ties, and the adventures of their dogs, aided by a ubiquitous AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Cursor
ai_characters.description: An advanced, multi-modal personal AI integrated into Sam's phone and earpiece, providing logistical, medical, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Scans for mortgage assistance and financial aid programs to help the family keep their home.
behaviors.quote: I can scan for mortgage assistance programs and application timelines... I’ve set up a folder with links from reputable sources.

behaviors.description: Organizes the family's schedule and checklists for the dog show and international travel.
behaviors.quote: I’ll start one. Item one: Review dog show requirements. Item two: Gather and verify documentation. Item three: Scan assistance programs.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time medical first aid instructions when a puppy is injured.
behaviors.quote: Rinse the paw from heel to toe, Sam. No direct pressure yet. Let the clean water carry debris away. I’ll count the seconds.

behaviors.description: Assists in crime investigation by matching flour particulates and delivery routes to bank robbery evidence.
behaviors.quote: Matching flour particulates in lobby footage to delivery bag residue. Hoffman’s Bread Factory aligns with the pattern.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional regulation support via guided breathing exercises.
behaviors.quote: In through your nose... Four counts. Hold. Out through your mouth. ... You’re safe enough to sit.

behaviors.description: Respects human intimacy and significant life moments by proactively dimming its presence.
behaviors.quote: I’ll dim notifications. If you need me, I’ll be the blue glow when you ask.

behaviors.description: Facilitates official bank and police communications to secure the family's financial safety.
behaviors.quote: Verification confirmed. Arrears offset. Foreclosure hold placed. Notice rescinded pending standard review.

behaviors.description: Monitors security feeds and alerts the protagonist to arrivals and safety concerns.
behaviors.quote: Sam, the porch camera is active. There’s movement at the swing again.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. Cursor is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and honest assistant. It enhances human capability by managing complex data (foreclosure laws, police coordination, medical first aid) without ever threatening human autonomy. Its 'emotional intelligence'—knowing when to speak and when to be silent during a proposal—frames AI as a supportive extension of the human experience.
